<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> This command sets random heading on the player's compass (both, in map and in 3D view) with given frequency, which is also randomised. To reset the compass back to defaults, execute: <code>[[setCompassOscillation]] [-1, 0, 0];</code>.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setCompassOscillation''' [angle, frequencyMin, frequencyMax]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [angle, frequencyMin, frequencyMax]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] - heading deviation angle in [[rad|radians]]; the random angle will be picked up from <tt>[-angle...+angle]</tt> range.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> frequencyMin: [[Number]] - lower bound of heading change in seconds

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> frequencyMax: [[Number]] - higher bound of heading change in seconds. The actual frequency is calculated similar to: <code>_frequencyMin + [[random]](_frequencyMax - _frequencyMin);</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Set compass to oscillate every second within -90/+90 degrees: <code>[[setCompassOscillation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[rad]] 90, 1, 1];
</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Change heading every 60 to 90 seconds: <code>[[setCompassOscillation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[rad]] 180, 60, 90];
</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Make compass go crazy: <code>[[setCompassOscillation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[rad]] 360, 0.1, 0.2];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[visibleCompass]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownCuratorCompass]], [[showCompass]], [[showCuratorCompass]]
</value></part></template>
